answerText: igneous rocks[10] This is the general term given to intrusive igneous bodies, which form when magma cools and crystallizes within the crust.

subject: Science
question: Question: One classification of this type of rock sorts them by the type of feldspar present. For 10 points each: [10] Name this type of rock formed by the cooling of magma.
